com.googlecode.objectify.impl

Interface KeyMetadata<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityClassTranslator

    public interface KeyMetadata<T>
    Interface for mapping key/parent fields on pojo entities.
    Author:
    Jeff Schnitzer

    • Method Detail

      • setKey

        void setKey(T pojo,
          com.google.appengine.api.datastore.Key key,
          LoadContext ctx)
        Sets the key onto the POJO id/parent fields

      • getKind

        String getKind()
        Returns:
        the datastore kind associated with this metadata

      • initEntity

        com.google.appengine.api.datastore.Entity initEntity(T pojo)

        This hides all the messiness of trying to create an Entity from an object that:

        • Might have a long id, might have a String name
        • If it's a Long id, might be null and require autogeneration
        • Might have a parent key
        Returns:
        an empty Entity object whose key has been set but no other properties.

      • getRawKey

        com.google.appengine.api.datastore.Key getRawKey(T pojo)
        Gets a key composed of the relevant id and parent fields in the object.
        Parameters:
        pojo - must be of the entityClass type for this metadata.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pojo has a null id

      • getParentFieldName

        String getParentFieldName()
        Returns:
        the name of the parent field, or null if there wasn't one

      • getIdFieldName

        String getIdFieldName()
        Returns:
        the name of the id field

      • hasParentField

        boolean hasParentField()
        Returns:
        true if the entity has a parent field

      • shouldLoadParent

        boolean shouldLoadParent(Set<Class<?>> enabledGroups)
        Returns:
        true if the parent should be loaded given the enabled fetch groups

      • isIdGeneratable

        boolean isIdGeneratable()
        Returns:
        true if the id field is uppercase-Long, which can be genearted.

      • setLongId

        void setLongId(T pojo,
             Long id)
        Sets the numeric id field
